text: <@ULCSUPTGU> Do you know what is causing the whitespace on their listing?
The description sidebar matches the height of the preview sidebar. All ‘Themes’ listings have the same issue.
Got it... Sorry <@U01FC7EUL5T>, looks like that one is on us.
Thank you for pointing it out! This is something that we should look into.
ok thanks! and no worries. someone on my team noticed.
